content: These are the visions that Isaiah son of Amoz saw concerning Judah and Jerusalem. He saw these visions during the years when Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah were kings of Judah.
Listen, O heavens! Pay attention, earth!
“The children I raised and cared for
Even an ox knows its owner,
but Israel doesn’t know its master.
Oh, what a sinful nation they are—
They have despised the Holy One of Israel
See how Jerusalem, once so faithful,
Once the home of justice and righteousness,
but they refuse to defend the cause of orphans
